articles.description: MICROSOFT could be about to ramp up the pressure when it comes to the next-gen console fight between the Xbox Series X and PS5, using the Xbox Game Pass.

articles.title: Shielding couple who haven't cuddled their grandsons since March share embrace - Daily Mail
articles.description: Barbara, 71, and Clive Walshaw, 73, from Bramley, in Leeds, West Yorkshire, who have been shielding since March 1, were able to hug their grandsons on December 25.
articles.content:
Two grandparents who have been shielding since March were finally able to share a loving embrace with their grandsons with the aid of inflatable polar bear costumes.
